TEXT.TITLE: CENTERRE <CTBC> ACQUIRES BENEFIT PLAN SERVICES
TEXT.BODY: Centerre Bancorp said it completed the acquisition of Benefit Plan Services Inc, Maryland Heights, Mo., which specializes in designing and administering small and moderately sized pension plans. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
